channel.title: Im getting seriously annoying by making a shop!
channel.description:
Ok first, question: When you open item.cfg, do u have to change every diffrent item in the shops bonus or cost?
And 2! Ive done everything the tuts have told me, i go on server, i see the maze guardian the only option is to talk to him, and he doesnt even talk! I want to be able to trade with him!
IM MAKING A SHOP! PLZ HELP!
